attributes.action: dissolve Parliament on June 8th and call a General Election to be held within 2 months
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is quite clear that the expenses scandals surrounding MPs and the Speaker both the present Parliament and this Government have lost all credibility and respect in the eyes of the majority of the electorate. This can only be restored by allowing the electorate their say in a General Election before the end of August 2009

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
